name: harvest mug cozy
notes:
**sometimes your drink can be a little to hot for holding the mug. this coffee mug cozy pattern will add a cute protective layer around the mug to protect your hands against the heat from a really hot drink.**

**size:** one size but adjustable within the pattern notes. 

**stitches & techniques used:** chains, slip stitch, single crochet, double crochet, working 2 special stitches - stacked single crochet and the puff stitch

**yarn:** 50 yards of #4 worsted weight â€“ we crochet dishie or lion brand 24/7 cotton or suitable substitute
